Judul: CASE STUDY OF PT. X PROJECT MANAGEMENT PERFORMANCE: CONSTRUCTION OF LOCATION AND DRILLING FACILITY FOR OIL WELL EXPLORATION, RANCA JAWAB (RCJ-B), WEST JAVA, PT. XYZ
Abstrak: The result of this research suggests that PT. X should implement the aid of technological information, specifically Microsoft Project, to smooth out the business process because this particular program can assist the company to a more organized state. Another recommendation is to implement the method of earned value management to prevent the company from imbalance within a project, with such factors of time, cost and quality. These two recommendations hopefully will be able to prevent the exact issue from occuring again in the future.
